## Pull Data from ARCGIS Online

Running `pull_arcgis_dat()` will download the most recent shapefiles and assign `FINAL_ID` to each segment
```{r pull_data, include=TRUE, echo=FALSE}

```

## Load data onto segments

Key thing to know:
links are from/to links taken from model 
segments are coded and joined links that are the transit corridor

``` {r load_data,  echo=FALSE}


```
